title: Far out kids animation
abstract: There's dragons (2 min.)--That's progress--The Lighthouse made three--Thumpalong--DuDu and the line.
description: The AFI put together this compilation of Australian animated films suitable for children under nine. It includes: "There's Dragons" - a funny film about a silly dragon, "That's Progress" - a young boy doing a school project on historic buildings is constantly thwarted by Mr Progress, who keeps demolishing the buildings to put up car parks, "The Lighthouse Made Three" a whimsical love story based on a popular song. "Thumpalong" about a king who hates music, and "DuDu and the Line", a celebration of the wild and free flowing transformations available to the animator.
related_objects: Title; B2002401; The mysterious geographic explorations of Jasper Morello; Active; 2004
